title: Total number of gang-related homicides in the United States 2012
summary: The statistic shows a forecast for the gang-related caused by Total number in United States from 2007 until 2012 , in homicides per month .
In 2012 , Total number IP gang-related is expected to reach 2363 homicides per month .
gold: Over 2,300 homicides were gang-related in the United States in 2012.
This was the highest amount since 2007 and a reversal of a negative trend from the previous two years.
Violent crime Violent crime in the United States is not limited to gang violence , but the murders in this statistic compose a significant portion of the number of reported murders in those years .
